#summary Overview of installation

= Introduction =

The !BigBlueButton 0.81 server runs under Ubuntu 10.04 64-bit.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:

    * [InstallationUbuntu Install from packages] (Ubuntu 10.04 64-bit)

After you've setup !BigBlueButton, you can configure the server using the `bbb-conf` tool. 

    * [BBBConf BigBlueButton configuration tool]

If you are new to !BigBlueButton, please read through the [TechnicalOverview overview] pages to understand !BigBlueButton's architecture and configuration.
